title: GoHigh Level Specialist (FT/PT/Project-Based)
job_overview:
We’re Hiring a GoHighLevel Expert – Applicants Based in the Philippines

Are you experienced with GoHighLevel and looking for a remote opportunity with steady work and long-term potential? Join our team and help US-based clients grow their businesses using your GHL expertise.

Work Schedule:
9:00 AM to 5:00 PM CST (US Time)
Equivalent to night shift in the Philippines
Fully remote / work from home

Compensation:
$5 to $7 USD per hour (depending on experience and skill level)

Responsibilities (Tasks may vary depending on the project or client requirements)
Set up and customize GoHighLevel accounts
Build and improve sales funnels, workflows, and automations
Manage CRM, pipelines, contact lists, and reporting dashboards
Integrate third-party tools (e.g., Zapier, email marketing platforms)
Provide technical support and user training
Stay up to date with GoHighLevel features and updates

Qualifications:
At least 2 years of hands-on experience with GoHighLevel
Strong knowledge of all major GHL features
Experience working with businesses, agencies, or entrepreneurs
Understanding of CRM systems, lead generation, and automation
Strong English communication skills (written and spoken)
Ability to work during US business hours (night shift PH time)

Bonus Skills (not required but nice to have):
Experience with Zapier or API integrations
Familiarity with white-label GHL solutions

How to Apply:
Send a short email to express your interest to Upgrade to see actual info
Use this subject line: GHL Specialist – [Your Full Name]


Application Tips:
Make sure your most recent work experience is updated on your resume
Highlight your GoHighLevel, CRM, and automation experience clearly
